attributes.action: change English libel law so that the defendent is innocent until proven guilty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At present the onus is on the defendant to prove that what they have written is true. This is a very costly business and acts as a muzzle on whistleblowers and journalists.

I quote from Sense About Science: "The use of the English libel laws to silence critical discussion of medical practice and scientific evidence discourages debate, denies the public access to the full picture and encourages use of the courts to silence critics."
